title: BBC Local Live: Cambridgeshire on Tuesday, 16 February 2016 - BBC News
summary: a major search operation has resumed in devon to find missing junior doctor rose polge , whose family live in melbourn .
friends of giulio regeni say the government has a `` moral responsibility '' to ensure a full investigation is carried out into death of the cambridge student in egypt .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 on wednesday .

documents.title: that 's all from cambridgeshire live
text: we 'll be back tomorrow with all the latest news , sport , weather and travel between 08:00 and 18:00 .
remember , you can get involved at any time .
send us your stories and
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: social media bid to find owner of hand-drawn comic
text: before we go , this hand-drawn comic was found lying on the pavement on mill road , in cambridge , and hanna who found it wold like to get it back to the young artist who made it .
she can be contacted on twitter @ hanna louise
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: cambridge city councillor named as labour candidate for pcc election
text: cambridge city councillor and former firefighter dave baigent has been selected as labour 's candidate for cambridgeshire 's next police and crime commissioner .
author: Cambridge News

documents.title: weather : dry overnight with clear spells allowing a patchy frost
text: it will stay dry across the area through the evening and overnight .
minimum temperature : 0c ( 32f ) .
after a chilly start tomorrow , it will be a dry morning with some bright or sunny spells.. a yellow warning for snow has been issued for tomorrow evening .
for more on the outlook where you live head to bbc weather .
author: Alex Dolan
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: councillors vote against cambridgeshire county council budget
text: councillors have voted against passing cambridgeshire county council 's budget by 33 votes to 28 .
the full council meeting , at shire hall , has been adjourned to see if a compromise can be found .
you can read more about the cuts proposed in the budget here .
author: Hannah Olsson
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire political reporter

documents.title: headlines : family of missing doctor 'overwhelmed ' by support arrest made after wisbech stabbing
text: here are the top stories in cambridgeshire this evening :
author: Kerry Devine
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: whittlesey world war one soldier became first 'friendly fire ' casualty just days after war declared
text: arthur rawson , from whittlesey , became the first world war one british soldier to be killed by 'friendly fire ' , just five days after war was declared .
the cambridgeshire regiment corporal was shot accidentally , by his friend pte alfred davis , while they were billeted at romford in essex , on 8 august 1914 .
the story was uncovered by researchers looking into the histories of troops who signed a visitors ' book a a tea room in peterborough .
author: BBC News Magazine

documents.title: department of health : 'our thoughts are with dr polge 's family '
text: a department of health has issued a statement about missing junior doctor rose polge .
it reads : '' our thoughts are with dr polge 's family and friends at an extremely difficult time but we will not be making further statements while the police pursue their enquiries '' .
the search for the missing doctor is continuing off the coast around ansteys cove in devon .
author: Kerry Devine
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: travel : crash involving two lorries in ely
text: a crash involving two lorries has closed the a142 stuntney causeway , in ely .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: your e-luminate festival lights up cambridge
text: this image of the judge business school , in cambridge , lit up as part of the e-luminate festival , was taken by dave amann .
the festival , which features light shows projected on famous cambridge buildings , finishes tomorrow .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man arrested following wisbech stabbing
text: an 18-year-old man has been arrested in connection with a stabbing on churchill road , wisbech .
at about 17:15 yesterday , police were called to a property where a man in his 20s had received `` life-threatening '' injuries .
the victim , a man in his 20s , remains in a critical condition at the queen elizabeth hospital , kings lynn .
author: Kerry Devine
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: note found in car belonging to missing doctor
text: the bbc understands that a note was found in the car of missing junior doctor rose polge , which contains a one line reference to health secretary jeremy hunt .
it 's thought to be a passing reference within a note about other issues .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: cyclists ' verdict as cambridge 's cyclepoint opens at railway station
text: the biggest cycle park in the uk opened its doors yesterday in cambridge , with commuters at the city 's railway station getting to use the £ 2.5m facility for the first time - and they welcomed it .
author: Cambridge News

documents.title: family of missing doctor 'overwhelmed ' by support
text: the family of missing doctor rose polge , from melbourn , say they are `` overwhelmed `` by support from her friends and colleagues .
in a statement issued this afternoon they thanked poeple who had been helping search for her on the devon coast .
the 25-year-old doctor , whose car was found in a car park near ansteys cove in devon , disappeared on friday .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: breakingfamily of missing doctor rose polge issue statement
text: the cambridgeshire family of rose polge , the 25-year-old doctor currently missing in devon , have released the following statement : `` we would like to thank everyone for their help and kind words .
`` the support we have received from family and friends has been much appreciated , and clearly rose is loved far and wide '' .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: drone used in search for missing junior doctor rose polge
text: police have used a drone in the search for missing junior doctor rose polge , whose family live in cambridgeshire .
divers are currently searching just south of the cove , as part of a major search operation .
police said it was `` totally out of character '' for her to go missing , adding that concerns for her welfare are rising .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : a fine afternoon with plenty of sunshine
text: after a cold start , it is going to be a fine afternoon with plenty of sunshine .
maximum temperature : 7c ( 45f ) .
the blue skies over the county today were captured in this of trees near linton , by bbc weather watcher 'ginny ' .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: cambridge county council meet to debate budget
text: a full council meeting of cambridgeshire county council has begun at shire hall , in cambridge , to debate the budget and proposed cuts to services..
the council is streaming it live
full council is just starting - we will be debating setting our budget .
you can watch the debate live
author: Hannah Olsson
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire political reporter

documents.title: snow warning issued for cambridgeshire
text: a yellow early warning of snow for cambridgeshire on wednesday night has been issued by the met office .
for more details head to bbc weather .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: councillors uncertain if county council budget will be passed
text: none of the councillors i 've spoken to at the full council meeting at shire hall would predict whether cambridgeshire council 's budget would be passed today .
the council says cuts of £ 120m over the next five years are needed because the authority will be getting less money from central government .
but liberal democrat , labour and independent counciilors have criticised plans not to raise the council tax precept to fund adult social care .
author: Hannah Olsson
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire political reporter

documents.title: divers join investigation into disappearance of junior doctor rose polge
text: divers are currently searching just south of anstey 's cove , in devon , for clues to the disappearance of dr rose polge .
a major search for the 25-year-old junior doctor , whose family are from melbourn , in cambridgeshire , has been under way since friday .
author: John Ayres
BBC News

documents.title: headlines : search resumes in devon for missing doctor from cambridgeshire
text: if you are just joining us here are the top stories in cambridgeshire this morning :
author: Sam Edwards
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: how cambridgeshire soldier became first 'friendly fire ' casualty of world war one
text: a visitors ' book from a tea room in peterborough has helped reveal the extraordinary story of how a cambridgeshire regiment soldier became the first 'friendly fire casualty of world war one .
cpl arthur cecil rawson , from whittlesey , was accidentally shot by a fellow soldier at the very start of the war in 1914 , before he had even left britain .
the details were uncovered by researchers looking into the stories of troops , who had signed a visitors book in peterborough , during the war .
author: BBC News Magazine

documents.title: police trying to trace 'offender ' after wisbech stabbing
text: cambridgeshire police say they are trying to trace `` the offender '' following a stabbing in wisbech .
officers were called to a property in churchill road at 17:15 yesterday where a man had received `` life threatening '' injuries .
det insp dave murphy said : we are treating this as an isolated incident as we believe the offender and the victim were known to one another . ''
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: breakingman in critical condition after being stabbed in wisbech .
text: a man in his 20s , suffered life-threatening injuries following the incident at a property in churchill road , wisbech , at 17:15 yesterday , police say .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : services between london and stansted disrupted due to obstruction on the line
text: services between london and cambridge have been disrupted because of an obstruction on the line at harlow town .
we are hearing reports of an obstruction on the line at # harlowtown .
services from london to stansted airport & cambridge are at a stand .
gk
@ twitterid possibly a faulty train ?
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: more than 100 people involved in search for missing junior doctor
text: more than 100 people are involved in the search for missing junior doctor rose polge in devon , including her boyfriend and her family , who live in melbourn , cambridgeshire .
devon and cornwall police say that due to the volume of information from the public , a new a dedicated log has been set up .
anyone with information that can help the search is asked to call 101 , quoting log 704 .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: possible 'life threatening ' injuries sustained by person in chatteris crash , say police
text: police say they believe one person `` may have sustained life threatening injuries , '' in a three vehicle crash on doddington road in chatteris .
we 'll bring you more on this soon .
author: Sam Edwards
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: search resumes in devon for missing doctor from cambridgeshire
text: a major search has resumed in devon for missing junior doctor rose polge , whose family live in melbourn .
police , coastguards and search and rescue groups have been looking for dr polge since friday , after her car was found in a car park near ansteys cove .
devon and cornwall police confirmed an item of clothing was found at the cove yesterday , but would not say whether they believed it belonged to dr polge .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : doddington road , chatteris , now closed following three vehicle crash
text: doddington road in chatteris has been closed following is closed following a three vehicle crash .
police say one vehicle has left the road and is in a field .
author: Helen Burchell
BBC News

documents.title: last display of protest from milton road as 1,800 sign petitions against city deal plans
text: there was a final display of defiance by milton road residents yesterday as a petition signed by more than 900 people opposing city deal travel plans was handed in to transport chiefs .
author: Cambridge News

documents.title: disruption to trains between cambridge and ipswich
text: train services between cambridge and ipswich are being disrupted due to a track defect , abellio greater anglia is reporting .
08:30 - disruption to services via # ipswich due to a track defect & updates : no other major disruption to report .
kb
author: Sam Edwards
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: travel : three-vehicle crash in chatteris
text: police are reporting a three-vehicle crash on doddington road , chatteris .
author: BBC Travel
